name: Helvin Rymer
short_about_me: I am a web developer with over 3 years of experience developing high quality user interfaces. I've worked on testing, debuggin and researching new and current technologies and trends. I have a proven ability to build dynamic themes, write re-usable code and pay great attention to detail.
short_description: I AM A WEB DEVELOPER WITH OVER 3 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE DEVELOPING HIGH QUALITY USER INTERFACES, TESTING, DEBUGGING AND RESEARCHING NEW & CURRENT TECHNOLOGIES, AND TRENDS. I HAVE A PROVEN ABILITY TO BUILD DYNAMIC THEMES, WRITE RE-USABLE CODE AND GREAT ATTENTION TO DETAIL WITH PIXEL PERFECT PROJECTS.
what_im_looking_for: I am a web developer with over 3 years of experience developing high quality user interfaces. I've worked on testing, debuggin and researching new and current technologies and trends. I have a proven ability to build dynamic themes, write re-usable code and pay great attention to detail.

jobs.summary: Web development. Working with multiple languages, frameworks, etcâ€¦ I write HTML, JS, CSS3, Php, Sass, and some MySQL. Working with ReactJs, VueJs and Wordpress.

Front End React Developer At iMedia Inc I primarily worked on https://RollByADP.com and https://blog.RollByADP.com building dynamic React front end components with Sitecore JSS.
On a separate project we worked on https://criterionticketing.com just when Vue3 released. My work on this project includes building front end components and functionality. We worked with Tailwind for styling.
I also did content management for ADP.com international with Sitecore.
Assist in development of Wordpress plugins, react components, internationalization of new trailways.ca expansion, accessibility enhancements and Google maps api.

cont_education.field_of_study: Complete React Developer W/ (REDUX, Hooks, GraphQL)

projects.workDone: I was the lead front-end developer on this project. We worked on this to implement Sitecore JSS for the site. Pixel perfect CSS matching perfectly with designs and responsive!
I worked on content entry for this site on an international scale with Sitecore. We managed Chinese, Italian, German, and Swiss among other languages.

I worked as part of a team on this project. My responsibilities included building components assigned to me, testing component for the component, and the functionality of the component. We worked with Vue3 as a framework.

awards.summary: I earned this award by eagerly helping my team and others within the company to be better. I very much believe in constructive criticism, whether I'm the person being criticized, or I'm the one criticizing.
